content:
The enemy attacked a rescue machine that returned from the elimination of a fire caused by a hostile shelling.

About thisShe reported March 8State Emergency Service.

According to her, the Russians dropped the ammunition from the drone on a fire truck.

The impact was damaged by a fire truck. Fortunately, no rescuers were injured.

Earlier the ArmyinformreportedTwo rescuers were killed in the Donetsk region during the extinguishing of the fire caused by shelling.
title: In Kharkiv region, the Russians hit the drone on rescuers
description: This was reported on March 8 by the State Emergency Service. According to her, ...
author: Army Inform
